member.name: T:SISONKE_Invoicing_RESTAPI.Controllers.CustomersInvoiceItemsController
member.remarks: CustomersInvoiceItemsController requires a user to be logged in and have specific role to access the end points CustomersInvoiceItemsController has the following end points: Get current logged in user's order details - required role is Customer Get All CustomersInvoiceItems information - required role is Administrator Get a CustomersInvoiceItems with User id - Authenticated user (Administrator, Employee) Get InvoiceItems with Invoice id - Authenticated user (Administrator, Employee, Customer) Get InvoiceItems with Shipping id - Authenticated user (Administrator, Employee, Customer) Using CustomersInvoiceItemsRepo

member.name: T:SISONKE_Invoicing_RESTAPI.Controllers.CustomersPaymentsController
member.remarks: CustomersPaymentsController requires a user to be logged in and have specific role to access the end points. CustomersPaymentsController has the following end points: Get current logged in user's invoice details - required role is Customer. Get All CustomersPayments information - required role is (Administrator, Employee). Get a CustomersPayments with User id - Authenticated user (Administrator, Employee). Using CustomersPaymentsRepo.

member.name: T:SISONKE_Invoicing_RESTAPI.Controllers.DiscountsController
member.remarks: DiscountsController has the following end points: Get all Discounts Get Discounts with id Get Discounts with Name Put (update) with id and object Post (Add) using a Discounts View Model Delete with id

member.name: T:SISONKE_Invoicing_RESTAPI.Controllers.InvoiceItemsController
member.remarks: InvoiceItemsController has the following end points: Get all InvoiceItems Get InvoiceItems with id Put (update) InvoiceItem with id and InvoiceItem object Post (Add) InvoiceItem using a InvoiceItems View Model Delete InvoiceItem with id

member.name: T:SISONKE_Invoicing_RESTAPI.Controllers.InvoicesController
member.remarks: InvoicesController has the following end points: Get all Invoices Get Invoices with id Get Invoices with date Get Invoices between dates Put (update) Invoice with id and Invoice object Post (Add) Invoice using a Invoices View Model Delete Invoice with id

member.name: T:SISONKE_Invoicing_RESTAPI.Controllers.NotesController
member.remarks: NotesController has the following end points: Get all Notes Get Notes with id Get Notes with method Get Notes with date Get Notes between dates Put (update) Note with id and Note object Post (Add) Note using a Notes View Model Delete Note with id

member.remarks: PaymentsController has the following end points: Get all Payments Get Payments with id Get Payments with method Get Payments with date Get Payments between dates Put (update) Payment with id and Payment object Post (Add) Payment using a Payments View Model Delete Payment with id

member.name: T:SISONKE_Invoicing_RESTAPI.Controllers.ProductsController
member.remarks: ProductsController has the following end points: Get all Products Get Products with id Get Products with Name Put (update) Product with id and Product object Post (Add) Product using a Products View Model Delete Product with id
